Signal input function: "Start Single Data Set"The signal input function mustbe set.
Description: The set data set is started without a sequence via a rising edge.A data set is set via the signal input functions "Data Set Bit 0" to"Data Set Bit x".

Signal input function: "Data Set Bit 0" to "Data SetBit x"Adjustable for signal inputsDI0 ... DI5
Description: The signal input functions "Data Set Bit 0" to "Data Set Bit x" areused to set a data set in a bit-coded way.The set data set is immediately confirmed; it does not need to beconfirmed with the signal input function "Data Set Select".
